title: Couple Kiss: Man, Woman
description: A depiction of a man and a woman in the act of kissing. This emoji signifies romantic affection, love, and intimacy between a heterosexual couple.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts a man leaning in for a gentle kiss, his lips pursed with a soft, rosy hue.  The signature Apple 3D shading gives him a rounded, almost tender appearance, with subtle highlights reflecting realistic lighting.  This emoji on Apple devices is often used to convey affection, romantic interest, or a sweet farewell, adding a personal and intimate touch to digital conversations.
